title: Sunflower Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Kanata-san…. apparently…. today is sunflower day. So.... look. I bought…. sunflower seeds. Want to plant together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Heeh, today is sunflower day huh~ But, if Kanata remembers correctly~.... Aren’t they supposed to be planted a bit ago? Kanata remembers planting them in a pot around May back in elementary….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I see…. I’m too late, I guess…. Rina-chan’s board「Sad」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Waah! But, but, it’s okay to start now! If we place it on the sunniest spot in the clubroom, water it everyday, and let it hear our songs, it’ll definitely do it’s best~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Is it the same as…. playing classical music for vegetables?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>That’s right, it really works~. Kanata’s teacher talked about it, so. Since we’re going to plant one, we might as well do our best to take care of it and have it bloom into a bi~g flower<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yes…. I’ll work hard. Rina-chan’s board「Passionate」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>It’ll be great if it can bloom into a big flower and produce a lot of seeds. Once we get the seeds, let’s eat them~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Eh, you can eat them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Look, it says “edible” on the bag, right? It has a sweet smell and is really delicious~. Ehe, Kanata can’t wait~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
